paramInformation.label: LED Indication
paramInformation.description: Specify if LED should indicate special event.

metadata.inclusion: Set your controller in include mode. Place a magnet at the rounded edge. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds. A long LED blink indicates that the inclusion was successful.
metadata.exclusion: Set your controller in exclude mode. Place a magnet at the rounded edge. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds. A long LED blink indicates that the exclusion was successful.
metadata.wakeup: Place a magnet at the rounded edge. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds, A LED blink indicates success.
metadata.reset: Place a magnet at the rounded edge. When the LED blinks, move the magnet away. Repeat a total of 3 times within 10 seconds, but on the 3rd repetition, leave the magnet at the rounded edge for 10 seconds. A long LED signal indicates success.
